alert.note: Alert for Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:42PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Kiowa and northern Bent Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 442 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Haswell, or 31 miles northwest of Lamar, moving north at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Kiowa and northern Bent Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
